body.p: This page describes the update and upgrade operations of Ceph cluster and Ceph client.

Perform the following steps to upgrade:
Login to deployer node.
Execute the following command to upgrade Ceph cluster:cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts hlm-upgrade.yml

ol.li:
Execute the following commandceph -s
Above command should report the health as HEALTH_OK.

Verify the Ceph version by logging on the Monitor and/or OSD node(s) and executing following command:ceph --version
Above command should return the version string of the latest package installed on the system.
